source: AIHSR Risk Reference Tool v1.5 (Tamiko Eto)

modelTypes.name: Predictive Models
modelTypes.description: Models that forecast outcomes based on input data patterns

modelTypes.name: Large Language Models (LLMs)
modelTypes.description: Neural networks trained on large text corpora for natural language understanding and generation

modelTypes.name: Generative Models (non-LLM)
modelTypes.description: Models that generate new content (images, audio, etc.) excluding large language models

modelTypes.name: Classification Models
modelTypes.description: Models that categorize inputs into predefined classes

modelTypes.name: Recommendation Systems
modelTypes.description: Models that suggest items or actions based on user preferences and behavior

modelTypes.name: Supervised Machine Learning
modelTypes.description: Models trained on labeled datasets with known input-output pairs

modelTypes.name: Computer Vision Models
modelTypes.description: Models that analyze and interpret visual information from images or video

modelTypes.name: Unsupervised Machine Learning
modelTypes.description: Models that find patterns in unlabeled data without predefined outcomes

modelTypes.name: Speech & Audio Models
modelTypes.description: Models that process, analyze, or generate speech and audio content

modelTypes.name: Reinforcement Learning (RL) Systems
modelTypes.description: Models that learn optimal behavior through trial-and-error interaction with an environment

modelTypes.name: Semi-Supervised Learning
modelTypes.description: Models trained on a mix of labeled and unlabeled data

modelTypes.name: Self-Supervised Learning
modelTypes.description: Models that learn from unlabeled data by creating supervised tasks from the data itself

modelTypes.name: Multi-Modal Models
modelTypes.description: Models that combine and process multiple data types (text, images, audio, etc.)

modelTypes.name: Foundation Models
modelTypes.description: Large-scale models trained on broad data that can be adapted for many downstream tasks
